sentences.en: A vicious price war between manufacturers has cut margins to the bone.
sentences.cn: 制造商之间的恶性价格战已将利润削减到了最低。

sentences.en: Amelia had inherited her mother’s good bone structure .
sentences.cn: 阿梅莉亚遗传了母亲的优美骨架。

sentences.en: Amelia had inherited her mother’s good bone structure.
sentences.cn: 阿梅莉亚遗传了母亲的优美骨架。

sentences.en: Bone marrow transplantation began 20 years ago.
sentences.cn: 骨髓移植开始于20年前。

sentences.en: costs will have to be cut to the bone.
sentences.cn: 成本必须降到最低程度。

sentences.en: he makes no bones about his feelings towards the militants.
sentences.cn: 他直言不讳地说出了自己对激进分子们的态度。

sentences.en: He measured the speed at which ultrasonic waves travel along the bone.
sentences.cn: 他测出了超声波穿过骨头的速度。

sentences.en: he's a cop to the bone.
sentences.cn: 他是个地地道道的警察。

sentences.en: His collar bone only hurt when he lifted his arm.
sentences.cn: 他的锁骨只有在抬臂时才感觉到痛。

sentences.en: his contempt cut her to the bone.
sentences.cn: 他的轻视对她伤害极深。

sentences.en: his thigh had been axed open to the bone.
sentences.cn: 他的大腿被斧头砍伤及骨头。

sentences.en: I'm frozen to the bone out here.
sentences.cn: 我在这里快冻死了。

sentences.en: It has survived by cutting its costs to the bone.
sentences.cn: 它通过最大限度地降低运营成本生存了下来。

sentences.en: Now the river bed is bone dry.
sentences.cn: 现在河床已完全干涸了。

sentences.en: Our bone marrow contains fat in the form of small globules.
sentences.cn: 我们的骨髓中含有小球状的脂肪。

sentences.en: she hasn't got a sympathetic bone in her body.
sentences.cn: 她一点同情心都没有。

sentences.en: Skin, bone and flake the fish.
sentences.cn: 去鱼皮、鱼骨，再把鱼肉片成薄片。

sentences.en: something good was bound to happen; he could feel in his bones.
sentences.cn: 他本能地觉得一定会有好事发生。

sentences.en: The body is made up primarily of bone, muscle, and fat.
sentences.cn: 人体主要是由骨骼、肌肉和脂肪构成。

sentences.en: The bone hasn't knitted together properly.
sentences.cn: 骨头愈合得不好。

sentences.en: The bullet lodged in the sergeant's leg, shattering his thigh bone.
sentences.cn: 子弹嵌进了中士的腿里，使其股骨碎裂。

sentences.en: The main bone of contention is the temperature level of the air-conditioners.
sentences.cn: 争来争去无非是空调温度。

sentences.en: The X-ray showed that the bone was broken in two places.
sentences.cn: X光检查显示有两处骨折。

sentences.en: There are 2,000 children worldwide who need a bone marrow transplant.
sentences.cn: 全世界有2,000名儿童需要骨髓移植。

sentences.en: What I saw chilled me to the bone.
sentences.cn: 我看到的景象令我不寒而栗。

words.tran_cn: 骨骼的；去掉骨头的；用骨架撑起的；施过骨粉料的；去骨的
骨的；多骨的；瘦骨嶙峋的；似骨的

phrases.tran_cn: 骨粉（可用作动物饲料或肥料）
争论的焦点；争端的原因

phrases.phrase: cut (或 pare) something to the bone
have a bone to pick with someone
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)同…有争端要解决，对…有理由怀恨
深深地（或本能地）感到，理解，相信，知道
对…毫不犹豫，对…直言不讳

phrases.phrase: not have a —— bone in one's body

phrases.tran_cn: 甲骨（中国商朝用来刻写占卜文字的龟甲兽骨）
(澳大利亚)（土著）以凶符骨指向…咒其倒霉（或丧命）

phrases.phrase: to one's bones (或 to the bone)
phrases.tran_cn: 深入骨髓，彻底地，到极点

phrases.phrase: what's bred in the bone will come out in the flesh
work one's fingers to the bone
phrases.tran_cn: 不住手地工作；勤奋工作

trans.tran_en: one of the hard parts that together form the frame of a human, animal, or fish body
to remove the bones from fish or meat
